1.title: Yomenu's Hannukah Special
1.plot: For Hannukah, Yomenu visits Delice Bakery to join in the baking of traditional souvganiot (jelly doughnuts) and later makes heirloom potato pancakes on the ranch at night on the outdoor griddle by coyote call.

2.title: The Way the World Ought to Be
2.plot: Yomenu sits down with the Chief Rabbi of the United Hebrew Congregations of the Commonwealth to discuss Blessings Over Food, Music as Wings for the Soul and How the World Ought To Be.

3.title: KOR WhipMaster
3.plot: Yomenu the Kosher Organic Ranchero whips up a batch of old style pickles; and we get a break neck overview of the bull whip from Whip Master Anthony DeLongis; and finally s glimpse of Mrs. A's buried Dutch Oven roast technique.

5.title: Purple Cherokee Pizza & Sub Sand Cruise with Ron Campbell
5.plot: Yomenu the Kosher Organic Ranchero makes pizza from scratch with heirloom Cherokee Purple tomatoes, basil and spelt flour. Then set sail with Yo and guest Ron Campbell, artist, actor and sailor as they enjoy gourmet avocado and cheese submarine sandwiches afloat aboard Ron's vessel, the Valhalla.

6.title: Bourbon Blackberry Ice Cream Sauce over Pink Lady Apple Pie
6.plot: Yomenu the Kosher Organic Ranchero makes a dessert from heaven with Homemade Ice Cream topped with Bourbon Blackberry Sauce and Straus Whipped Cream sprinkled with course coffee grounds all over a slice of warm Heirloom Pink Lady Apple Pie.

7.title: How to Build a Great Cook Fire to Roast Meats
7.plot: Yomenu the Kosher Organic Ranchero reveals the secret to building a cook fire, chopping kindling with his double headed ax to make a cedar fire to roast corn in the husk, organic chicken and to seared beef for a pita packed with purple peppers - followed by a rare serenade of a fire-side Gold Rush song.

8.title: The Seven Species Inside Yomenu's Tabernacle
8.plot: Yomenu the Kosher Organic Ranchero welcomes you inside a traditional "tabernacle" -- a festive agricultural harvest booth, commemorating the cool shade of divine shelter. See how to design a gorgeous platter of foods from The Land and celebrate the joy of the temporal as part of the Feast of Sukkot at any time of year!

9.title: Kosher Organic Japanese Cuisine with Oguri
9.plot: Join Yomenu the Kosher Organic Ranchero and his guest chef, celebrated dancer Oguri, as they visit an historic Sawtelle family market to prepare Kosher Japanese cuisine: shitake mushrooms over salmon on braised onion, served with minced Okura on tofu, and cucumber sesame salad.

10.title: Romanian Mamaliga & Scottish Shortbread with June Faibish-Claman
10.plot: Yomenu the Kosher Organic Ranchero visits with accomplished actress and grand dame June Faibish-Claman, as they recreate the Romanian Mamaliga & Scottish Shortbread of her youth on the North American shtetl of the Saskatchewan plain. Heart-breakingly beautiful stories served with high tea.

11.title: Sprouted Hummus & Hilbeh with Ari Zimmerman
11.plot: Yomenu the Kosher Organic Ranchero visits with guest chef Ari Zimmerman, to make impossibly delicious hummus from sprouted, organic, raw garbanzo beans, as well as Yemenite "Hilbeh" made from sprouted Fenugreek seed, served with green tea and Ari's father's singing from an historic recording.

12.title: The Science Hidden in the Boston Cream Pie with Tziporah
12.plot: Yomenu the Kosher Organic Ranchero teams up with Tziporah, a scientific baking enthusiast, to conduct a delicious experiment, commonly referred to as a "Boston Cream Pie." Tziporah explores the extraordinary science underlying commonplace baking and gives Yomenu a shock when she successfully drops the cake!

13.title: Barberi & Lavash with Griddled Peppers & Heirloom Vegetables
13.plot: Yomenu the Kosher Organic Ranchero treks up the Sierra Nevada to Silver City Resort at Mineral King where, in his Sequoia kitchen, he prepares Barberi and Lavash with roasted pepper quesadillas and griddled heirlooms.

imdb.title: Kosher Organic Ranchero
plot: Ride with Yomenu from the high country to the Great Blue Heron Ranch to make fresh salsa over quesadillas and IL Gigante - his signature giant pancakes.::Anonymous
